column4: hi there. I'm on to my machine after 2months cuz was having my exams and seems like i;;ve forgotten my su and user password for ubuntu logins. what shall I do ???
you need a live CD or your install and try to get revover with that - that is why we say don't use a root password :-(
that is a matter of editing the file /boot/grub/menu.lst and changing the number beside default
